title: Clear noon, slow city driving with 8 braking events.
caption: A slow-moving ego vehicle on a city street with 8 braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.0 m/s). There are 8 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a city street with moderate traffic. There are several other cars and a parked truck on the side of the road. The weather is clear and sunny, with no visible obstacles or pedestrians.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is likely driving at a slow speed to ensure safety and avoid any sudden braking or maneuvering.
